title: LoL Won't open on my Mac
body:
Hi everyone,

LoL won't open on my macbook pro. I've tried the 'UserKernel' method, and it still doesnt work. The icon bounces once, then nothing.

What could I try? This has happened before and I'm tired of re-installing the game. 


Thanks,

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be launching League from the dock. Make sure you're launching it from your *Applications Folder* to ensure it can launch correctly. If that still doesn't do the trick, then this is likely caused by your Client being unable to reach the Patching Servers. In this case, I'd recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) to address the most common causes for this.

Let me know if this helped.
